articles.title: Jeff Woodke, humanitarian worker kidnapped in Niger, has been freed - USA TODAY
articles.description: American humanitarian worker Jeff Woodke was kidnapped from his home in Niger in 2016 by men who ambushed his guards and forced him into their truck.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON An American humanitarian worker who was kidnapped in the West African nation of Niger has been freed.
